name: Slow Motion Warfare
description:
!!! [PROTOTYPE] !!!

This game is in a PROTOTYPE stage. You might want to: Play for some time, to get the concept; Follow me and track the game's progress, to see if i upload anything new; Propose great feature ideas for me to resolve how to implement them.

Notes:

  • Reload the page to respawn.
  • You also get a new random weapon when you do so.

Here's a convenient list of what i'm planning to add in future updates:

  • Pickable weapons
  • Ammo and weapon reloading indicators
  • A real menu, with buttons, and stuff. (Not that i dislike my [Run game] button.)
  • Perhaps a... storyline!
  • Anything i like (and feel confident to implement) from your suggestions below.
